::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(mistlecode)

options(scipen = 999)
```
:::



## Part 1



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mat <- mistlecode::read_matrix('input.txt')
mat_all <- mat
expand.grid(
  'x' = mat |> ncol() |> seq_len(),
  'y' = mat |> nrow() |> seq_len()
) |>
  purrr::pmap_int(\(x, y) {
    mat_copy <- mat
    if (mat[y, x] == '.') return(4)
    mat_copy[y, x] <- '.'
    vals <- 
      mistlecode::get_adjacent_values(y, x, mat_copy) |>
      as.vector()
    if (all(vals == '.')) return(4)
    vals |>
      table() |>
      _[['@']]
  }) |>
  (\(x) x[x < 4])() |>
  length()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1512
```


:::
:::



> 1512
